message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a unique opportunity to acquire a high-value item that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product might be high to you, but I am only willing to pay up to $1500000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I was really hoping to get closer to the value I have in mind. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $1750000 for the product. Can we discuss further?
Hello Alice, I've considered your offer and while I understand your perspective, I'm still unable to go above $1500000 for the product. I hope we can find a way to meet somewhere in the middle.
